short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make site's video player fullscreen without going in fullscreen mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is not a video player, instead this extension makes the SonyLiv, YouTube and Hotstar Video player to cover the entire screen of the browser without making the browser to go into the fullscreen mode.
